mapper.select: SELECT bookshelf.isbn, appraisal.star, appraisal.comment, user.id, user.name FROM appraisal INNER JOIN bookshelf ON bookshelf.status_no = appraisal.status_no INNER JOIN user ON bookshelf.user_no = user.user_no WHERE appraisal.co_prv = '공개' ORDER BY appraisal.appraisal_no DESC limit 5
